rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: This is a spacious open-plan area that serves as the entrance hall and living area, designed to maximize natural light with large windows and ample ventilation. It features Vastu compliant alignment with positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Contemporary Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, this open-plan kitchen is designed for modern functionality and natural light. It includes modern appliances and a dedicated pantry space, following local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with ensuite
rooms.description: This bedroom provides a private master suite with an adjoining bathroom for enhanced comfort. The design incorporates ample natural light and ventilation while aligning with Vastu principles for health and well-being.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom ensuring privacy and proper ventilation, designed following local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space strategically placed to ensure minimal distractions with natural light. Designed with built-in storage and ergonomic seating arrangements for productivity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: This utility room is designed for storing cleaning supplies and other maintenance equipment, ensuring the villa remains clutter-free.

openings.location: Multiple strategic positions across living area and kitchen to maximize natural light and cross ventilation. Includes large windows facing east or north as per Vastu guidelines.
Main entrance door with a vestibule for security, plus internal doors connecting the various rooms.

rooms.name: Study Area / Lounge
rooms.description: An additional relaxation and study space, providing a secondary living area with access to the garden for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A balcony attached to the master bedroom offering a private outdoor space, enhancing views and ventilation as per Vastu principles.

openings.location: Balcony windows designed for optimal natural light and ventilation.
Connecting ground floor to first floor, centrally located for easy access and compliance with local building codes.
